divs: Sighting DetailsHi, I was on a plane flying over the area trike Coatzacoalcos Veracruz, about 2000 feet and crosses an object like a white below me, very fast and very close to my plane ... I was scared because it feared a crash ... had no wings and was like a cigarette or cigar ....this happened about 10:30 A.M. flew two people and they both saw ... sorry, the event was so fast that we had with cameras and did not have time to photograph ... was quick few days later, I started with ringing in the ears that today ..... I'm trying clinically I do not want to associate, but again, a few days after the event, my ears buzzed very strong .... already down, but still I have .....
